Events.OnCreate:
(block (targetObj) (switch ; Need a major Ares station in the system (not (setq targetObj (random (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "ATE +ares; +majorStation;")))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource targetObj)
(msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 100) ) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (targetObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID))) ) ; Prepare the station to be reconned (staClearReconned targetObj) (staSetFireReconEvent targetObj)
; Register events (msnRegisterForEvents gSource gPlayerShip) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch ; If the player dies, the mission fails. (= aObjDestroyed gPlayerShip) (msnFailure gSource)
; Destroying target is an alternative way to win (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) (msnSuccess gSource) )

Language.Text:
(cat "Your mission is to fly within visual range of " (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 4) ".

"
"System: " (sysGetName) "
" "Payment: " (fmtCurrency 'credit (msnGetData gSource 'reward)) )

(cat "The XO walks up to you.\n\n"
"\"Good to see you pilot. We've got a mission for you.\"" )

(cat "\"We need you to do a recon mission on " (objGetName (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) 4) " in this system. All you have to do is fly past it and make visual contact. " "We'll enter the coordinates to your computer. What do you say?\"" )
"\"Get the hell out of here then!\""
"\"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!\""
"\"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!\""

(switch (gr (objGetVisibleDamage gPlayerShip) 75) "\"Outstanding mission! You better report to Docking Services to have all that damage repaired!\""
(gr (objGetVisibleDamage gPlayerShip) 25) "\"Outstanding mission! Looks like you got a little banged up out there.\""
"\"Outstanding mission! You made it look easy.\"" )
